# Copilot Instructions

This is an sbt plugin for Azure DevOps credentials written in Scala.

**Always read these files before making changes:**
- [README.md](../README.md) - Usage documentation and project overview
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - Development setup, coding conventions, and commit guidelines

## Key Files

- `src/main/scala/dev/chungmin/sbt/AzureDevOpsCredentialsPlugin.scala` - Main plugin code

## File Formatting

- No trailing whitespace
- End files with a newline (Linux style)
- Use LF line endings, not CRLF
- In Markdown files, do not insert line breaks to wrap long lines (some renderers incorrectly display them as actual line breaks)
